# When to use Azure SQL Edge
An optimized relational database engine geared for IoT and IoT Edge deployments. It is a containerized Linux application that runs on a process that is based on ARM64 or x64.

![When to use Azure SQL Edge](../images/when-to-use-azure-sql-edge.png){.center .image-large}

Use SQL Edge when you need to:

- Capture continuous data streams in real time.
- Integrate the data in a comprehensive organizational data solution.
- Synchronization and connectivity to back-end systems.
- Overcome connectivity limitations.
- Overcome slow or intermittent broadband connection.
